header.title: Razis Apartments
header.text: Just 600m from the local beach, Razis Apartments are on a green hill with a sea view that ensures a fresh breeze even during the hottest summer days.

first-section.title: About Razis Apartments
first-section.text-1: Razis apartments are on a green hill with a sea view that ensures a fresh breeze even during the hottest summer days. The rooms are surrounded by olive, fig, lemon, mulberry, bay, jasmine, and many other trees and flowers that form an ideal atmosphere for enjoying sunny mornings, cool afternoons, and tranquil evenings.
first-section.text-2: The property is an 8-minute walk from the beach and offers self-catering units just a 10-minute drive from Zakynthos town. Razis has a swimming pool and offers free on-site parking. The pool area includes a snack bar that serves refreshing drinks and exceptional dishes. Guests can use the sun beds and umbrellas free of charge, and there is also a smaller pool for the children.
first-section.text-3: Razis air-conditioned rooms feature wooden sloping ceilings and balconies with views of the sea, pool, or garden. Guests can dine at one of the many restaurants in Tsilivi. The village also features many bars and shops. Razis offers lighting-fast free Wi-Fi access at the whole facility.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: If you don't find what you need here, throw us an email!
faq.q1: Where can i park my car?
faq.a1: We have ample private parking space, so you don't need to worry about that.
faq.a2: Yes, and we are really proud of it! Everything is made on the spot, with locally sourced, handpicked ingredients.
faq.q3: Do you have a transfer service?
faq.a3: We do not have our own in-house transfer service, but we are more than happy to arrange a taxi or a mini-bus for you!
faq.q4: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faq.a4: Check-in is from 14:00, and check-out is until 11:30. If you want to check-in/out a different time let us know and we can work it out.
faq.q5: Can i have a bed of my preference?
faq.a5: Please let us know in advance, and we will try to satisfy your request.

our-effort.title: The people behind Razis Apartments
our-effort.text: We are a family-run business established back in the 70s. After so many years of experience, we learned to do everything ourselves. In the process, we created a unique hosting experience. Even this very website is built by us!

desc.1: Our studios are perfect for a couple or a lonely traveler. They consist of one double bed or two singles, with a sea view or the beautiful village of Planos.
Legend has it that one Dutch writer lost his spark. Weeks went by without touching a pen - he was becoming desperate.
desc.2: Whilst on vacation he used to sit on the balcony, overlooking the vast emptiness of the sea. Suddenly in a moment of inspiration, he grabbed his beloved pen and started writing without a stop.
desc.3: It was then that he knew there was something special about that room. Give yourself a chance to experience the writer's room and who knows, you may find him wandering around.

desc.1: Razis apartments fall under three categories:
desc.2: One-bedroom apartments can accommodate up to four people.
desc.3: Two-bedroom apartments can accommodate up to six people.
desc.4: Maisonettes can accommodate up to four people with two floors and an inner staircase. This room type is not recommended for people with mobility problems or young children.
desc.5: All rooms have garden or sea view, and are spacious - perfect for your family moments.

desc.1: The storehouse is a beautiful old renovated building built-in 1939. Its main use was as an additional storage building for the large country house of the estate. The front ground floor was used for stabling the horses and donkeys while the rest of the building was used to store the harvest of olives, currants, grain, and cheese. The upper floor stored hay and other animal feed.
desc.2: The 1953 earthquake, which razed Zakynthos, destroyed the two-storied farmhouse leaving the family unharmed and the storehouse intact. The time had come for the agricultural way of life to give way to the swiftly and steadily growing tourist industry. The storehouse was abandoned until early 1980s when it was renovated and restored into a building suitable for habitation.
desc.3: The buildings insulation is unparalleled as the exterior walls are 1 meter thick. The exterior ocher walls provide a welcoming atmosphere for a shady and beautiful veranda.
